Key Match Events: Rashid Khan picked up an injury scare in Brisbane on Tuesday
Rashid Khan appeared to be in immense pain as he walked off the field during the penultimate over of the match
Rashid had completed his quota of 4 overs but was not able to carry on as he was helped off the field by the physio and his teammates
Post-Match Reflections: Trott, speaking to the press after Afghanistan's loss to Sri Lanka, said Rashid will undergo scans to have the extent of the injury assessed but he said it is not serious
Trott revealed that the leg-spinner had headed into the World Cup with a back injury concern
